title: Virtual Care
description:
At Virtual Care, we are dedicated to providing a wide range of exceptional medical services that prioritise your health and well-being. Our team of highly skilled healthcare professionals is committed to delivering compassionate care and personalised treatment options to meet your unique needs.

Virtual Care Africa is a Web/Android/iOS platform that avails the top notch Medical Doctors, General Practitioners, Specialists and Medical Services to any patient who accesses the platform locally or internationally. We are the ultimate answer to the challenge posed by limited access to quality medical services in our vast geographical locations and high medication costs. A patient exhibiting any symptom simply downloads the app, quickly registers, searches for a Doctor by specialty, choses package then books for audio or video appointment with readily available Doctor. Our platform is built by internationally accredited developers and has multi-layer security features helping to secure client information

Virtual Care combines Telemedicine, Mobile Doctor Services, 24- hour Virtual Care In-House, and Outside Physical Medical Clinics for outpatient services. Patients receive medical assessments, treatment plans, prescriptions, and requests for lab tests and/or diagnostic investigations. Patients have access to their personal medical records.

summary: Virtual Care we are dedicated to providing a wide range of medical services.
